Incomplete list of open source projects that I started:

Larigot (#gemini bulletin-board) - https://github.com/ObieSource/larigot
Prestant (gemini pastebin) - https://codeberg.org/FiskFan1999/prestant
"O3YL" (gemini archiver) - https://codeberg.org/FiskFan1999/o3yl
boltdoc (tui to view and edit bolt databases) - https://codeberg.org/FiskFan1999/boltdoc
peertube-multipart-upload (upload videos to peertube from CLI) - https://codeberg.org/FiskFan1999/peertube-multipart-upload
FiskFan1999/gemini (My own gemini daemon and client) - https://codeberg.org/FiskFan1999/gemini
schuifkoppel (custom gemini reverse-proxy) - https://codeberg.org/FiskFan1999/schuifkoppel
